title: Linked against non-existing libshm.so
body_html:
Hello,

I just built torch 0.2.0 and both py2 and py3 binaries are linked to non-existing libshm.so
I read all related tickets however 0.2.0 feature all recent commits regarding this...

Regards, Adam.

acecile@HI-LIN-3RPRRY1:/tmp$ ldd /usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/torch/_C.cpython-35m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so
	linux-vdso.so.1 (0x00007ffc8b5f5000)
	libshm.so => not found
	libTH.so.1 => /usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/torch/lib/libTH.so.1 (0x00007fe929d22000)
	libTHS.so.1 => /usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/torch/lib/libTHS.so.1 (0x00007fe929af2000)
	libTHPP.so.1 => /usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/torch/lib/libTHPP.so.1 (0x00007fe92981d000)
	libTHNN.so.1 => /usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/torch/lib/libTHNN.so.1 (0x00007fe9294f6000)
	libATen.so.1 => /usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/torch/lib/libATen.so.1 (0x00007fe92903a000)
	libgcc_s.so.1 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgcc_s.so.1 (0x00007fe928e23000)
	libpthread.so.0 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0 (0x00007fe928c06000)
	libc.so.6 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6 (0x00007fe928867000)
	/lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x00007fe92ac00000)
	librt.so.1 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so.1 (0x00007fe92865f000)
	libm.so.6 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libm.so.6 (0x00007fe92835b000)
	libgomp.so.1 => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgomp.so.1 (0x00007fe92812e000)
	libstdc++.so.6 => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6 (0x00007fe927dac000)
	libdl.so.2 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdl.so.2 (0x00007fe927ba8000)
